title: kaDamaiyai maravAdE
sahitya:
kaDamaiyai maravAdE nenjE kaDamaiyai maravAdE


anupallavi

  viDu viDu tannalam vIN muyarccigaLellAm naDu naDu nallOrai narppaNI purindE


caraNam 1    irukkudu paNam enrE irumAppuk-koLLAdE Ezhaikkut-tarAmal pAzhukk-iraikkAdE
serukkum porAmaiyumE janmattum eNNAdE tEvaikku mElE nI sErttiDa unnAdE
    caraNam 2    AttirattuDan saNDaik-kALAgi nirkkAdE amaidiyum aDakkamum anbinai marakkAdE
mUtta arivinar mun mozhittedir uraikkAdE murai keTTup-pEshi nI varai keTTu vizhAdE
    caraNam 3    sattiyam eppOdum sATruvAi manamE vidyA garvamum viDu viDu manamE
uttamar nEsam unakku nan maNamE paTru viDuvadarkku pazhaguvAi dinamE
    caraNam 4    kaTradin payanaik-kAriyattil kATTu kAma krOdha lObhak-kaLvarai OTTu
peTra varumai iruLvan paNiyATru vanjaka sheyal viTTE nenjinait-tETru
    caraNam 5    pirar kurai Odi un pizhaigaLaip-perukkAdE pEccu naDattiyilum perumaiyai surukkAdE
ara vazhi marandu vIN ayuLaik-kuraikkAdE aNuvum nI mAyaikkE aDimaiyuTrirukkAdE
    caraNam 6    AyuLai dinakaran aruppadai eNNAi AtmAnandamAna amara vAzhunnAi
sEyanum uLLattuDan tUimaiyuTr-enrum deivattanmai aDaiyum shen neri naNNAi
    caraNam 7    shollum ezhuttODum yulangiyum kalviyil tozhirk-kalvi illAmarp-pazhippuTru nillAdE
velluga varumaiyiruL tollulagirp-pollAda kEDellAm vilagiDa nADSellAm vAzhndiDa
    caraNam 8    vAi vEdAntattAl vAikkumO balamE tUimaiyuTrAl vAzhvE tOnriDum nalamE
vAimai arivin munnE vasippOm nAmE vaDivu kaNDOrukku paDavennavAmE
    caraNam 9    kuvalayam kiDaippinum kuvindu nI kenjAdE kUr vizhiyuDan varum kUTrukkum anjAdE
tavattinai marandu nI savam enat-tunjAdE shakti unnaik-kAppAL taLarndu nI nillAdE
   caraNam 10    dEshap-paNiyin munnE nI kUsi nillAdE kAshu kAashu enrE nI karudAdE pollAdE
EsuvAr EsaTTum muyarcciyai niruttAdE dAsan shuddhAnandan shollai nI maravAdE
